title: UIC 2 bed 2 full bath Free Parking Free Laundry
posting_body: ['This is one of most convenient/cleanest/safest condo buildings two blocks west of the East UIC Campus.', 'It is located at the intersection of Flournoy & Lytle (SWC) in University Village.', 'This is the top 3rd floor unit so no hearing neighbors from your ceiling.', 'FULLY REHABBED IN 2021.', 'The unit features:', 'NEW Hardwood Floors', 'NEW Granite Counter Tops', 'NEW Stainless Steel Appliances', 'NEW Washrooms with Kohler amenities', 'NEW Paint Throughout', 'NEW Can Lights Throughout', 'Walk In Closets', 'Large Living Room w/Fireplace', 'Open Kitchen w/Large Breakfast area and lots of cabinets', 'Skylight in the Kitchen', 'Individual Central AC/Heat', 'Comcast/Cable Ready', 'FREE PARKING SPOT IN THE BACK LOT', 'FREE LAUNDRY IN THE BASEMENT', 'FULLY FURNISHED', 'This is a quiet mostly professional building and we are looking to keep it that way.', 'This is truly a nice place with a great location and excellent amenities.', 'Security Deposit: 1.5 months', 'Rent: $2500/month', 'Occupancy: 3 people max', 'Availability: Aug 1, 2022', 'For any questions, please email me.', 'Showings can be done after 7pm weekdays or 12 to 6pm weekends.']
